name: language-scilab
description: Scilab language (fork) support in Atom. This package is based on language-scilab of Jeremy Heleine.

wheramiCompatible.title: Show "whereami"- compatible line numbering
wheramiCompatible.description: If activated, this option will display the line numbers **Scilab**. Typically, this means that every function-Tag will start a relative line numbering beginning at 1.
